channel.title: Setting up adventurer using easyRSC - help Please
channel.description:
Ok so ive rewriten the code for the adventurer and checked out npcloc,ncphandler,npcdef, ive used my code, the code provided and even tried a code off my mates server yet still cant seem to get it running on this.
If you could help me out i would be very greatfull!
Oh and yea ive used search but to no avail, wouldn't post unless i was really stuck.
Thanks.
Oh and i got it runnin on a points system with ingame commands atm. (shows in the info tab how many points and how many levels you can have but not all skills working as yet- to set you use command - ::setlvl (1-att,2-str ect) 66 and then deducts however many points from available points) still alittle buggy but coming along nicely.

item.title: Setting up adventurer using easyRSC - help Please
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

hits self over head

Fixed ty for help.

Might be releasing points code when im finished just need to test it more.

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up adventurer using easyRSC - help Please
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Find NpcHandler.xml in the server conf folder

Open it and add this

Your NPC ID org.rscdaemon.server.npchandler.YOUR FILE NAME(without .java)

Read full topic
